Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 164th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Martin Sherrard (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2015, off Demetrio Kabas (NY)...
Injured on 5/9/2015 with a Broken Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Brooklyn on 8/26/2015...
Injured on 9/22/2015 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2017, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 6/25/2017 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2017, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2017, hitting .387 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/5/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $4,999,999 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 6/27/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2019, hitting .343 with 4 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/5/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/9/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $1,800,000 per year...
